p: Environmental-friendly alternative options have been proposed, e.g., the use of activated carbon to adsorb some contaminants or enzymatic degumming to remove phospholipids without altering the quality of the oil [ 50, 65, 66]. Supercritical fluid technology has been used to remove some undesired compounds like free FAs or toxic compounds (e.g., dioxins), and to degum or bleach the oil as well [ 50, 51].
